name: SpaNoise
0:
”Alexa open Spa Noise”
”Alexa ask Spa Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spa noise
des:
Transform your space into a serene spa retreat with soothing spa sounds. From gentle music to calming water sounds, this skill will help you relax, rejuvenate, and find your inner peace.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Spa Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
